per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*tan(3.6*time);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*cos(4.1*time);
per_frame_3=wave_b = -1 + ((1-wave_r) + (1-wave_g));
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=pfthresh = above(bass_att,pfthresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,pfthresh))*((pfthresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_6=pfdx_r = equal(pfthresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(pfthresh,2))*pfdx_r;
per_frame_7=pfdy_r = equal(pfthresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(pfthresh,2))*pfdy_r;
per_frame_8=rg1 = abs(sin(time));
per_frame_9=rg2 = 0*above(rg1,0.75) + 1*below(rg1,0.25) +
per_frame_10=      2*above(rg1,0.25)*below(rg1,0.5) + 3*above(rg1,0.5)*below(rg1,0.75);
per_frame_11=rg3 = if(equal(pfthresh,2),rg2,rg3);
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=q1 = wave_r;
per_frame_14=q2 = wave_g;
per_frame_15=q3 = wave_b;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=echo_orient = rg3;
per_frame_18=wave_x = wave_x + 0.2*sin(1.15*time)+0.26*cos(1.62*time)+0.13*sin(1.1*time);

per_frame_20=ob_r = 0.5+0.5*sin(1.1*time)*sin(1.62*time);
per_frame_21=ob_g = 0.5+0.5*cos(0.72*time)*sin(0.62*time);
per_frame_22=ob_b = 0.5+0.5*sin(0.51*time)*cos(0.1*time);
per_frame_23=mv_r = q3;
per_frame_24=mv_g = 1-abs(q2);
per_frame_25=mv_b = q1;
per_frame_26=monitor = rg3;
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=tg1 = abs(sin(time));
per_pixel_5=tg2 = 1*above(tg1,0.5) + 2*below(tg1,0.5);
per_pixel_6=tg3 = if(equal(thresh,2),tg2,tg3);
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=dy = dy + 0.01*sin(4*x)*sin(time);
per_pixel_10=dx = dx + 0.01*sin(4*y)*sin(time);
per_pixel_11=dx = dx - dx_r*(sin(2.4*time));
per_pixel_12=dy = dy - dy_r*(cos(2.4*time));
per_pixel_13=
per_pixel_14=zoom = zoom - 0.004*abs(rad*time*max(12*dy_r,12*dx_r))*(1-rad);
per_pixel_15=rot = rot + 0.8*(1-rad)*tg3;
